title: Revocation Request
description: A Revocation Request is sent to a Revocation service to request a Revocation of a document signature.

jws.description: This is the original signed document to be revoked.

revocationchecksum.description: The is the Revocation Checksum document to be published as a revocation.

priority.description: This is the priority of the Revocation Request, indicating the urgency of the Revocation to be published.
